commits.author: tummychow
commits.body: Set three capture indexes to correctly scope the string punctuation.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Correctly matches "without time zone" and adds support for timestamptz keyword used in PostgreSQL. Fixes #11, thanks to Aaron Burghardt.

commits.author: tummychow
commits.body:
The ending quote in a string.quoted.double.sql was not being highlighted
correctly. This commit corrects the submatch to fix this problem.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: This allows the special <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>â†©</kbd> snippet to function.

commits.summary: Require `)` in decreaseIndentPattern to start a line
commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: It was too liberal before matching any paired parentheses.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: This corrects a handshake error that can happen with newer versions of MySQL, fixes #8.

commits.summary: Improve matching of excluded items during condensing
commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Use the parsed version of the document from TextMate to remove all comment types and exclude all string types from the condensing. Fixes #4.

commits.summary: add some symbol list for SQL file.
commits.author: Samson Wu

commits.summary: Use TM_APP_IDENTIFIER to find the preference file.
commits.author: Michael Sheets
